clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment of Prisoners With Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder in Trondheim Prison
clinical_study.official_title: Treatment of Prisoners With Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder in Trondheim Prison

lead_sponsor.agency: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Norwegian University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: The treatment of ADHD in jail will help the prisoners in their rehabilitation process

detailed_description.textblock: Prisoners with ADHD will be offered treatment with Stratera, and we wanted to study their use of the prisons rehabilitation offers as school, programs and work training before and after treatment with Stratera.

primary_outcome.measure: The symptoms of Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorders and the prisoners use of the prisons rehabilitation services before and after treatment will be measured

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
All prisoners that fullfill the diagnostic criterias for ADHD -
Exclusion Criteria:
All other prisoners -
